<think>

<tool_call>
{"name": "execute_python", "arguments": {"code": "import asyncio
import python_weather

async def get_weather():
    async with python_weather.Client(unit=python_weather.IMPERIAL) as client:
        weather = await client.get('Huizhou')
        print(f"Current Weather in Huizhou:")
        print(f"Description: {weather.description}")
        print(f"Temperature: {weather.temperature}°F")
        print(f"Humidity: {weather.humidity}%")
        # Check if wind information exists before accessing
        if hasattr(weather, 'wind_speed') and hasattr(weather, 'wind_dir'):
            print(f"Wind: {weather.wind_speed} mph, Direction: {weather.wind_dir}")
        else:
            print("Wind: N/A")
        print(f"Pressure: {weather.pressure} hPa")

asyncio.run(get_weather())", "input": ""}}
</tool_call>
